name: Solitaire Cube Solo Bundle
description:
Solitaire Cube Free: your favorite classic card games in a fast, modern package.

Features 5 ways to play:
• Klondike: The Classic.
• Spider: A personal favorite. Kinda like unwinding a knot: challenging, but satisfying.
• Freecell: The Mind Bender. The most challenging and rewarding way to play.
• Pyramid: The Speed Demon. Looking for a fast-paced game? Try Pyramid.
• Golf: Sometimes called TriPeaks. With fewer peaks.

Universal app runs silky smooth on all devices.
• iPhones, iPads and even iPods all supported.
• Big, clear cards with sharp graphics and no clutter.
• 3D animations so real you'd think it was in VR
... Ok maybe not, but we did work really hard on the animations.

Created by Tim & Ether ... aka Tether Studios. An old-school mom & pop family business. You can find us on Twitter @tetherstudios. We'd love to know what you think!
